DOC.brief_summary: The investigator investigate effect vitamin D3 supplementation metabolic profile ( anthropometric measure , blood pressure Lipids , lipoproteins glycemic index ) overweight obese woman .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Vitamin D Metabolic Profile Overweight Obese Women
DOC.detailed_description: Vitamin D deficiency worldwide health problem determine risk factor Cardiometabolic disorder include Cardiovascular disease , Metabolic syndrome , type 2 diabetes mellitus . The investigator investigate effect vitamin D3 supplementation metabolic profile overweight obese woman . A double blind randomize clinical trial conduct 77 premenopause overweight obese woman . Participants classify two group : vitamin D supplementation [ 1000 IU/day cholecalciferol tablet ( n=39 ) ] placebo ( n=38 ) . Vein blood sample take least 12 hour overnight fast . Selected anthropometric measure , blood pressure Lipids , lipoproteins glycemic index measure baseline 12 week . Body fat mass determine use BIA . Also investigator assess dietary intake use 24 hour food recall semi-quantitative food frequency physical activity use IPAQ questionnaire . The investigator conduct study October 2009 March 2010 Medical school , Tehran , Iran . Recruitment begin October 2009 via advertisement terminate October 2009 . The investigator exclude patient history Cardiovascular disease , Liver disease , Gastrointestinal disease , Kidney disease , diabetes mellitus , Osteoporosis . Moreover , pregnancy , lactation , vegetarianism , intake dietary supplement exclusion criterion .
DOC.criteria: Female 1850 year old Premenopause BMI â‰¥25 Cardiovascular disease Liver disease Gastrointestinal disease Kidney disease Diabetes mellitus Osteoporosis Pregnancy Lactation
